csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <macro name="parental-suffix-delimiter">
    <group delimiter=" ">
      <group>
        <text variable="title" suffix=". "/>
      </group>
      <text variable="note"/>
    </group>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="
">
      <choose>
        <if type="chapter">
          <text macro="parental-suffix-delimiter"/>
        </if>
      </choose>
      <text value=". ["/>
      <text variable="locator"/>
      <text value="]"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
